summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road with trees lining both sides. A silver sedan is consistently ahead of the self-driving vehicle. The road is relatively clear with moderate traffic. The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and distance from the silver sedan ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and follows the silver sedan ahead, keeping a safe distance. The vehicle does not change lanes or make any sudden movements, indicating a steady driving pattern.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed and direction.
